Venting Breach.name: Venting Breach
Venting Breach.flavor: The primal spirits preserving reality’s bounds relax their vigil to loose raw elemental energy to scourge the enemies around you.
Venting Breach.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The attack's damage is the type you chose for your Elemental Breach class feature.

Form of the Living Breach.name: Form of the Living Breach
Form of the Living Breach.flavor: Your normal form sloughs away to reveal the chaotic energy composing the breach. Your foes find themselves drawn toward you to face the elemental storm you embody.
Form of the Living Breach.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the living breach until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses. In addition, when an enemy starts its turn within 3 squares of you, as a free action you pull the target 1 square and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Living Breach Attack power.
Form of the Living Breach.requirement: The power Form of the Living Breach must be active in order to use this power.
Form of the Living Breach.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage of the type you chose for your Elemental Breach class feature (save ends).
Form of the Living Breach.eachFailedSavingThrow: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 damage of the type matching the ongoing damage.

Recall the Breach.name: Recall the Breach
Recall the Breach.flavor: Your spirit allies funnel the elemental breach’s power into your body so that your weapon and armor resonates with chaotic power.
Recall the Breach.trigger: You hit with a weapon attack granted by your guardian form
Recall the Breach.effect: Your attack deals 2d6 extra damage of a damage type matching the type chosen for your Elemental Breach class feature. Also, until stance ends when an enemy adjacent to you hits you with a melee attack, that enemy takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier or Wisdom modifier. The attack's damage is the type you chose for your Elemental Breach class feature.
